snippet.title: Forgotten Fragments - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Forgotten Fragments will launch soon on steam and you can check the first trailer.

Wishlist now on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1492090/Forgotten_Fragments

Forgotten Fragments is a 2D pixel art puzzle platformer, where you need to help Enid, Ryder and Dayen recover the long lost Forgotten Fragments to unravel the mysteries of the dungeon.

You can check all our socials here:
https://linktr.ee/binaryphoenixgames
